Detailed Description

Main namespace of framework.

Contains every class, structure, function, constant involved with 3D graphics in the engine.

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum g3d::RW_ALPHA_FUNCTION

Alpha Function.

Specified function how compare objects with alpha.

Enumerator:
RWAF_NEVER  Never.
RWAF_ALWAYS  Always.
RWAF_LESS  Less.
RWAF_GREATER  Greater.
RWAF_EQUAL  Equal.
RWAF_LEQUAL  Lequal.
RWAF_NOTEQUAL  Notequal.
RWAF_GEQUAL  Gequal.

enum g3d::RW_CG_PROGRAM

Cg program.

Type of cg program - vertex, fragment or geometry shader.

enum g3d::RW_CG_PROGRAM_TYPE

Cg program type.

Internal type of cg program, loaded from outside.

enum g3d::RW_HW_ARRAY_ELEMENT_SIZE

Hardware Array Element Size.

Specifies size of element hardware arrays.

Enumerator:
RWHAES_1  One element.
RWHAES_2  Two elements.
RWHAES_3  Three elements.
RWHAES_4  Four elements.

enum g3d::RW_HW_ARRAY_ELEMENT_TYPE

Hardware Array Element Type.

Specifies element type of array element, and size.

Enumerator:
RWHAET_FLOAT  Float.
RWHAET_DOUBLE  Double.
RWHAET_UBYTE  Unsigned char.

enum g3d::RW_HW_ARRAY_TYPE

Hardware Array Type.

Type of hardware vertex array.

Enumerator:
RWHAT_POSITION  Position array.
RWHAT_NORMAL  Normal array.
RWHAT_COLOR  Color array.
RWHAT_TEXCOORD  Texture coords array.

enum g3d::RW_HW_ARRAY_USAGE

Hardware Array usage.

Specifies how can often data will be reloaded. Only three values are specified. Most description is below.

Enumerator:
RWHAU_STATIC_ARRAY  Program load only once data.
RWHAU_DYNAMIC_ARRAY  Program will reload from time to time data, driver shuold allocate AGP memory.
RWHAU_STREAM_ARRAY  Program load only once data, array can be discarded - data are valid only for a one frame.

enum g3d::RW_HW_INDEX_ARRAY_ELEMENT_TYPE

Hardware Index Array Element Type.

Specifies array element type, and size.

Enumerator:
RWHIAET_UINT  Unsigned int.
RWHIAET_USHORT  Unsigned short.

enum g3d::RW_HW_INTERNAL_ELEMENT_TYPE

Hardware Internal Element Type.

Internal format of element in hardware vertex/index array.

Enumerator:
RWHIET_FLOAT  Float.
RWHIET_DOUBLE  Double.
RWHIET_UBYTE  Unsigned char.
RWHIET_UINT  Unsigned int.
RWHIET_USHORT  Unsigned short.

enum g3d::RW_MAGFILTER_MODE

Texture magnification filtering mode.

Informs renderer how filter texture if it is zoomed out.

Enumerator:
RWMAGFT_NEAREST  Nearest.
RWMAGFT_LINEAR  Linear.

enum g3d::RW_MATRIX_MODE

Matrix Mode.

Specifies on which matrix renderer operates.

Enumerator:
RWMM_PROJECTION_MATRIX  Projection matrix.
RWMM_MODELVIEW_MATRIX  Modelview matrix.
RWMM_TEXTURE_MATRIX  Texture matrix.

enum g3d::RW_MINFILTER_MODE

Texture minification filtering mode.

Informs renderer how filter texture if it is zoomed in.

Enumerator:
RWMINFT_NEAREST  Nearest.
RWMINFT_LINEAR  Linear.
RWMINFT_MIPPMAPED_NEAREST_NEAREST  Nearest-Mipmap-Nearest.
RWMINFT_MIPPMAPED_LINEAR_NEAREST  Linear-Mipmap-Nearest.
RWMINFT_MIPPMAPED_LINEAR_LINEAR  Linear-Mipmap-Linear.

enum g3d::RW_POLYGON_DRAW_MODE

Polygon Draw Mode.

Specified polygon draw mode.

Enumerator:
RWPDM_POINTS  Draw points.
RWPDM_LINES  Draw line.
RWPDM_FILL  Draw filled polygons.

enum g3d::RW_POLYGON_SIDE

Polygon side.

Specified polygon side, for polygon draw mode.

Enumerator:
RWPS_FRONT  Front side.
RWPS_BACK  Back side.
RWPS_FRONT_AND_BACK  Both sides.

enum g3d::RW_SMOOTH_MODE

Smooth mode.

Specifies shading mode.

Enumerator:
RWSM_FLAT  Flat shading.
RWSM_SMOOTH  Smooth shading.

enum g3d::RW_STATES

Machine States.

Specifies enabled/disabled renderer states.

Enumerator:
RWS_BLENDING  Blending.
RWS_DEPTH_TEST  Depth test.
RWS_ALPHA_TEST  Alpha test.
RWS_LIGHTING  Lighting.
RWS_TEXTURE_2D  2D Texturing.

enum g3d::RW_TEXTURE_INTERNAL_FORMAT

Internal Texture format.

Specified internal type texture in memory.

Enumerator:
RWTIF_CHOOSE  Choose internal texture format.
RWTIF_ALPHA  Alpha.
RWTIF_LUMINANCE  Luminance.
RWTIF_LUMINANCE_ALPHA  Luminance-Alpha.
RWTIF_RGB  RGB.
RWTIF_RGBA  RGBA.

enum g3d::RW_TEXTURE_OUTPUT_FORMAT

Output Texture format.

Specified type of output pixels.

Enumerator:
RWTOF_CHOOSE  Choose ouput texture format.
RWTOF_ALPHA  Alpha.
RWTOF_LUMINANCE  Luminance.
RWTOF_LUMINANCE_ALPHA  Luminance-Alpha.
RWTOF_RGB  RGB.
RWTOF_RGBA  RGBA.
RWTOF_ABGR  ABGR.

enum g3d::RW_TEXTURE_TARGET

Texture Targets.

Specifies texture targets.

Enumerator:
RWTT_TEXTURE_1D  1D Texture.
RWTT_TEXTURE_2D  2D Texture.

enum g3d::RW_WRAPING_MODE

Texture wrapping mode.

Informs renderer how to wrap texture on the edges.

Enumerator:
RWWM_CLAMP  Clamp.
RWWM_REPEAT  Repeat.
RWWM_CLAMP_TO_BORDER  Clamp to border.
RWWM_CLAMP_TO_EDGE  Clamp to edge.
RWWM_MIRRORED_REPEAT  Mirrored repeat.
RWWM_MIRROR_CLAMP  Mirror clamp.
